description:
I did this video a while back and I'm including it this week as a bonus post for those who are interested. I think it's pretty well established by now that I'm into boys, but I really get off on watching straight guys fuck and enjoy themselves sexually in their "native environment."
Luke and Josh are two of my favorites, and when they saw Tina they both lit up. Josh is really cute when he cums... it's kind of unexpected and the look on his face is priceless.
title: Luke, Josh, & Tina
